attributes.action: Ban The Purchase of FIFA points within FIFA games as it is gambling.
attributes.background: Ban The Purchase of FIFA points within FIFA games as it is gambling such as people under 18 are buying them which is classed as illegal and this is an issue that needs to be issued

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the makers of the game.
